SurfaceValueObject.text: Not all love is ethical. Like you should never go after your friend's partner, it's just so low of them.
Love is a commitment and true love is rare. This shape doesn't even seem sad after they lost their partner, it's disrespectful to the sanctity of partnership.
You have to look hard if you want to find the one for you. This shape tries really hard to get themself out there, they are really true to their heart.
Love isn't everything! This shape abandoned their partner for another shape, love can be cruel.
If you always follow your heart, you will end up like this shape who has zero sense of duty or responsibility.
If you know the right shape, love can be a great thing! Like this shape who found their partner so early.
We shouldn't always follow our hearts. This shape has been in multiple partnerships and never thought through the consequences.
Love is deeper than we think. This shape entered a partnership, not for love but found love eventually in their family life.
Love can make smart shape do stupid things! Like this shape who went after a shape, they shouldn't be with.
